thread.section_title: BeLiteWeight - Weight Loss Services Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BeLiteWeight - Weight Loss Services | beliteweight.com
thread.title: Penny Courtney
thread.title_full: BeLiteWeight - Weight Loss Services reviewed by Penny Courtney

author: Penny Courtney
title: Penny Courtney
text:
The minute I spoke with Ishi about my journey about to begin, she was so supportive and encouraging. Any time I had questions I would just ring her up. She sent me all the paperwork needed and explained everything in detail to me.
What starts out as a scary thing is easily eased with Ishi.
I call her on occasion just to let her know how I am, I think I have found a long distant friend.
Thank you Ishi and God Bless You !!
